message: MNPP 0.1.1 with nginx settings for codeigniter has been released! http://bit.ly/lFEdBn
Honestly there are so many better frameworks that you could i have setup in that, http://cakephp.org/, http://www.symfony-project.com/, http://framework.zend.com/, etc

@italiano40 
Sure, MNPP have support for different cms and frameworks,  a framework is not better not mean you should not be used on MNPP
I am a fan of CI, although there are more cases where I just use ExpressionEngine and work from there on...
It seems archaic beside ruby on rails...
